metadata.title: USN-6634-1 -- .NET vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Brennan Conroy discovered that .NET with SignalR did not properly handle malicious clients. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2024-21386)  Bahaa Naamneh discovered that .NET with OpenSSL support did not properly parse X509 certificates. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2024-21404)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6634-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.127-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet7 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  dotnet-sdk-8.0 - 8.0.102-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-8.0 - 8.0.102-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-8.0 - 8.0.102-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-8.0-source-built-artifacts - 8.0.102-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  dotnet8 - 8.0.102-8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  aspnetcore-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host-8.0 - 8.0.2-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required
